title: Tommy by The Who
creator_credit: Ken Russell, Robert Stigwood and Robert Stigwood Organisation
brief_description: Tommy by The Who is based upon the Rock Opera by Pete Townshend with additional material by John Entwistle and Keith Moon. It is the story of a deaf, dumb and blind boy who is eventually cured and becomes a rock celebrity. Features Oliver Reed, Ann-Margret, Roger Daltrey and Elton John with guest appearances by Eric Clapton, John Entwistle, Keith Moon, Paul Nicholas, Jack Nicholson, Robert Powell, Pete Townshend and Tina Turner.
